Table of Contents

Class KafkaTestClientFactory

Namespace
Cheetah.Kafka.Testing
Assembly
Cheetah.Kafka.dll

A factory for creating IKafkaTestReader<TKey, T> and IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T> instances.

public class KafkaTestClientFactory
Inheritance
object
KafkaTestClientFactory

Remarks

This should only be used for testing purposes.

Properties

ClientFactory

The internal KafkaClientFactory used to create Writers and Readers.

public KafkaClientFactory ClientFactory { get; }

Property Value

KafkaClientFactory

Remarks

This property is exposed to allow more advanced functionality than KafkaTestClientFactory and the clients it creates provides and should NOT be used in production to generate actual clients. Use AddCheetahKafka(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration, Action<ClientFactoryOptions>?) instead.

Methods

Create(KafkaConfig, ClientFactoryOptions?, ITokenService?, ILoggerFactory?, ISerializerProvider?, IDeserializerProvider?)

Creates a KafkaTestClientFactory using the provided IConfiguration instance

public static KafkaTestClientFactory Create(KafkaConfig configuration, ClientFactoryOptions? options = null, ITokenService? tokenService = null, ILoggerFactory? loggerFactory = null, ISerializerProvider? serializerProvider = null, IDeserializerProvider? deserializerProvider = null)

Parameters

configuration KafkaConfig

The configuration to use

options ClientFactoryOptions

An optional

tokenService ITokenService

An optional token service, used to retrieve access tokens

An optional logger factory

deserializerProvider IDeserializerProvider

CreateTestReader<T>(string, string?, IDeserializer<T>?)

Creates an IKafkaTestReader<TKey, T> for the provided topic. This reader will not read keys.

public IKafkaTestReader<Null, T> CreateTestReader<T>(string topic, string? groupId = null, IDeserializer<T>? valueDeserializer = null)

Parameters

topic string

The topic to read messages from.

groupId string

Optional group id to use. Defaults to a random Guid.

valueDeserializer IDeserializer<T>

Optional valueDeserializer. Defaults to valueDeserializer from IDeserializerProvider provided in the constructor

Returns

IKafkaTestReader<Null, T>

The created IKafkaTestReader<TKey, T>

Type Parameters

T

The type of message to read

CreateTestReader<TKey, TValue>(string, string?, IDeserializer<TKey>?, IDeserializer<TValue>?)

Creates an IKafkaTestReader<TKey, T> for the provided topic.

public IKafkaTestReader<TKey, TValue> CreateTestReader<TKey, TValue>(string topic, string? groupId = null, IDeserializer<TKey>? keyDeserializer = null, IDeserializer<TValue>? valueDeserializer = null)

Parameters

topic string

The topic to read messages from

groupId string

Optional group id to use. Defaults to a random Guid.

keyDeserializer IDeserializer<TKey>

Optional keyDeserializer. Defaults to keyDeserializer from IDeserializerProvider provided in the constructor

valueDeserializer IDeserializer<TValue>

Optional valueDeserializer. Defaults to valueDeserializer from IDeserializerProvider provided in the constructor

Returns

IKafkaTestReader<TKey, TValue>

The created IKafkaTestReader<TKey, T>

Type Parameters

TKey

The type of key to read

TValue

The type of message to read

CreateTestWriter<T>(string, ISerializer<T>?)

Creates an IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T> for the provided topic. This writer will not produce keys.

public IKafkaTestWriter<Null, T> CreateTestWriter<T>(string topic, ISerializer<T>? valueSerializer = null)

Parameters

topic string

The topic to produce messages to

valueSerializer ISerializer<T>

Optional valueSerializer. Defaults to valueSerializer from ISerializerProvider provided in the constructor

Returns

IKafkaTestWriter<Null, T>

The created IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T>

Type Parameters

T

The type of messages to produce

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if the provided topic is invalid

CreateTestWriter<TKey, T>(string, Func<T, TKey>, ISerializer<TKey>?, ISerializer<T>?)

Creates an IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T> for the provided topic.

[Obsolete("Using a keyFunction is deprecated, please use the method CreateTestWriter without keyFunction parameter, and the function WriteAsync(params Message<TKey, T>[] messages)")]
public IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T> CreateTestWriter<TKey, T>(string topic, Func<T, TKey> keyFunction, ISerializer<TKey>? keySerializer = null, ISerializer<T>? valueSerializer = null)

Parameters

topic string

The topic to produce messages to

keyFunction Func<T, TKey>

A function which produces a key for the provided message

keySerializer ISerializer<TKey>

Optional keySerializer. Defaults to keySerializer from ISerializerProvider provided in the constructor

valueSerializer ISerializer<T>

Optional valueSerializer. Defaults to valueSerializer from ISerializerProvider provided in the constructor

Returns

IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T>

The created IKafkaTestWriter<TKey, T>

Type Parameters

TKey

The type of key to produce

T

The type of messages to produce

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if the provided topic is invalid
